title: Pet Friendly @peakslandingapts.com
posting_body: ['Welcome Home to Peaks Landing', 'Comfort comes easy at Peaks Landing.', 'Our Conyers apartments are the perfect place to call home.', 'We have crafted our community to cater to your unique needs.', 'Everyone from families, roommates, and anyone in between will enjoy the welcoming atmosphere of our community and apartment homes.', 'Finding an apartment for rent in Conyers, GA, is easy when you lease from Peaks Landing.', 'Our garden style 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartments are just what you need to simplify your home search.', 'The space you want is waiting for you at Peaks Landing.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Interested in more information?', 'See link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 856 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- •\tSpacious One, Garages Available', 'Pet Policy', 'We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is a $300 pet fee for one pet, and $500 for two pets.', 'Pet rent is $20 per month.', 'There is a weight limit of 80 pounds per pet, and aggressive breeds are prohibited.', 'Please contact us for more information.', 'Income Requirements:', 'You must make 3 times the rent to qualify and is based on your combined gross monthly income.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Peaks Landing', '1200 Peaks Landing SE, Conyers, GA, 30013', 'FzPWVhb16Yhy']
